alert.note: Alert for Aurora; Brule (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 7:29PM MDT until July 18 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Aurora County in south central South Dakota... Brule County in south central South Dakota... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 828 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Kimball to 7 miles south of Chamberlain to 10 miles northwest of Hamill, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Chamberlain ASOS reported a gust of 61 mph around 827 PM CDT. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Kimball around 840 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include White Lake and Grass Ranch Colony. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
